Reviews.Title: Very Good Value For The Money
Reviews.Author: Pechmerle
Reviews.Content: For the modest price, you get a quite decent camera.  It weighs about 4 ounces, so it is very easy to carry around (in a pocket, a purse or bag, a case attached to your belt, whatever).  It's a bit thicker than the Casio super-compact credit-card cameras.Like all the very compact Casio's, its control buttons on the back panel are quite small.  If you have big fingers, you probably won't like those controls.The camera has a very good assortment of scene mode choices, from "landscape" to "food."  There are no truly manual controls.  But you can compensate for that by making some setting choices, and be set up for the type of photo you are most likely to want to take.  I bought this camera for my wife (a certified non-photographer who wanted something to take on trips).  So, I set the ASA to 400 and a few other things.  This turned it into a truly point and shoot for her:  she could just turn it on and shoot anything in the daytime, have an adequate shutter speed, etc.  She never changed the scene mode on a ten day trip last summer, and didn't feel frustrated by that.  On the other hand, if she ever does get motivated to learn a little more, the scene mode choices are there.The camera uses a rechargeable mini lithium ion battery, rather than AA's (whether disposable or rechargeable).  I like this better, because AA's get expensive if you use them up, and are really expensive abroad.  The battery's charger is external, but is quite light and fairly small.  And you can use the charger in other countries.  It works in Europe; you just need a simple, inexpensive round-plug adapter (non-electronic, just for the shape) between its plug and a wall socket.All in all, good for what it is.

Reviews.Title: Cheap price, cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Kristen Broussard "GlutenFreeDiabticPumper"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as I thought it was a great price and I loved the color.  I was even happier with the color when it arrived...it is not a true purple.  It is more a fuchsia pink/purple.  It had some cool camera settings but they always didnt work out well as the ones with a flash, the flash was to bright and made the pictures white out and the non flash ones were too dark.  The camera also had a slow recovery time...so if you missed the perfect shot the opportunity was gone as it took a few seconds before you were able to take the next picture.  The main body of the camera seemed sturdy, but the battery door was a cheap flimsy plastic and seemed like it would snap off easily.  The battery door also did not like to stay shut.  Every time I turned around the darn thing was poped open again.  It was hard to get it to shut again...and would only stay a little bit.  Overall there are many better camera's for less than 100 bucks.  This is not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Augustus Frost "The Bear"
Reviews.Content: Now the first thing everyone has to remember is the fact that this camera is under $100 here on Amazon.com. So even though it's a great deal for a 12.1 MP camera that can shoot Youtube videos, you really aren't getting much. It doesn't come with all the "extras" that some of the other camers have. But it takes great pictures and video quality is pretty good in the right light. In low light situations the video looks grainy. but still better than most. I'm giving this a four star because of the price and the customer service that Casio has. I haven't had a problem with this camera but i have needed to call Casio's customer service before and well, they are pretty good and there isn't a whole lot of waiting on hold to talk to a person.So remember, for the price AWESOME camera, but you get what you pay for so don't go thinking that it is going to do what the $250 and $400 point-and-shoot cameras do.

Reviews.Title: nice n easy
Reviews.Author: ARIS
Reviews.Content: i really like this camera it was so simple to use. its small size made traveling with it very easy. i found that the camera is also pretty durable as i fell while holding it and banged it into the ground and it only was scratched up and still worked perfectly fine

Reviews.Title: Excellent design with all the basic options & HD
Reviews.Author: AenJailies
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very good pictures, has a super quiet video zoom and HD recording option along with youtube.The HD option is not advertised for this camera. I was surprised to find out that it has that option and failed to advertise it.The camera is easy to use. The setting of the function buttons can get in your way but no more than any other camera.The Cameras BS or Auto function allows it to take excellent pictures in artificial light.Camera has trouble keeping focus when zooming out while videoing.Camera focus icon is inaccurate, Focus icon will be red when the camera has perfect focus and green when our of focus on macro shots.Trust your what you see in the view screen over the focus icon.

Reviews.Title: Casio EX Z35
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: This camera is a limited version of later models.  While it has 12mp, it lacks any shutter speed and 80% or more of photos are somewhat to extremely blurry.  The menu is complicated and limited in choices.  Battery is not compatible with other Casio cameras.  Fair first time camera, but not dependable for quality.I purchased this model of Casio as a graduation gift for a friend.  It was actually a replacement for a Casio EX-Z80 which was damaged by airport baggage handlers.  The Z35 has a smaller screen, slower shutter speed, and is made composed of plastic whereas the later model was scratch resistant aluminum.  It takes horrible action (even mild action, like walking) pictures.  It does however take great stills.  I was really disappointed with this model.

Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim EX-Z35
Reviews.Author: Eric Molina
Reviews.Content: Camera is great, this is my second time buying a Casio. Easy to use, but a little slow. But it's still a nice camera!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera...
Reviews.Author: Steve Taylor
Reviews.Content: ... but not the best picture quality. I understand you only get what you pay for and this camera is very inexpensive so I can't complain too much. I found the color to rotate in hue from one picture to the next especially when indoors. The interface is excellent. The camera is very easy to operate, the controls are solid and the battery life is decent. The menus are so easy you don't even have to read the instructions (but I recommend it anyway). Tye body is solid and it's design is nice. The viewing screen is large, sharp and easy to see. The flash is powerful, so much that you'll have to back people off and use the zoom otherwise they may appear too bright and washed-out. If you're not real picky about the color phase then you'll love this camera. It was purchased for my wife and she loves it. (I don't do pink) =)

Reviews.Title: Thanks Casio
Reviews.Author: Vic M
Reviews.Content: Not quite as narrow as some of the other Exilim Casio cameras however just like all of the other Exilim models that I own (4) it takes nice pictures and is small and for the price an excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: Pictures
Reviews.Author: V. Gatley "music lover"
Reviews.Content: Great size. Carry all the time in purse so I'm always ready to take a picture.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Angela Corey "Angela Corey"
Reviews.Content: My old camera, the older version of this camera quit working last weekend... Well I can't be without a camera, I am always wanting to take pictures to create memorys that will last forever!!  Well I saw this camera on several sites, but I came to amazon and found it at the best price ever, I even got it cheeper then the older one!!The camera takes awesome pictures, you have to play around with the rezalution a little the first few shots I got were a little grainy, but once I played around with it the pictures came out as clear as a bell, and MUCH better then my older camera of the same modle ever took, you can see the fine details in the pic, such as rain drops on leaves etc.The camera comes with the basics, the power cord to charge the battery, the battery, a cord so you can play your pics on a tv screan, and the cord that you can download your pictures with.  It doesn't come with an SD card, that you have to go out and purchase seperatly.all in all I rate this camera on a scale of 1 to 10 ( one being the worst and 10 being the best ) I rate this camera as a 10 and higher I LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: Weak
Reviews.Author: Christopher A. Aquino "chrisa"
Reviews.Content: Pictures are whited out.  You must take pictures in perfect lighting to get good quality.  Should have listened to my wife and spent 40$ more and gotten a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Repeat Purchasor
Reviews.Author: Reflecto Ray
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I lost my first Exilim, but liked it's features so much i bought another one, a newer, up dated model, and it's quality exceeds the first!  I'm delighted!

Reviews.Title: Faulty Exilim
Reviews.Author: P. Lee
Reviews.Content: This camera arrived with one fault - the flash does not work in automatic,but it does work in other formats.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: shannon m territo
Reviews.Content: i had an older one and bought this its video takes and still pics last long and im very happy

Reviews.Title: Bueno Totalmente
Reviews.Author: Alejandra
Reviews.Content: Llego en perfecto estado, estoy muy contenta y agradecia con la compra, recomendable totalmente, pesonas cumplidas y correctas con lo que envian.

Reviews.Title: liss esposito
Reviews.Author: Liss
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied and happy because the product arrived just in time, attention and speed was great, I highly recommend them. thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: LB
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and a very good deal. Just mind the colors.The purple is hardly purple, it is closer to pink (though not quite pink either).The color in the picture is purple ... but that is not exactly what you get.Again ... great camera and recommended, but do consider the 14MP version at about the same price.

Reviews.Title: Have Had it for Nearly 2 Years
Reviews.Author: Serious Desi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera about two years ago. I haven't been nice to this camera, but it's still holding up, taking photos like the photos it took on the day I got it.Pros:-Super easy to use. I didn't read the manual, just used the Click-See-What-Happens method of learning the camera.-It has a ton of different modes.-With good lightening and the right mode it can take amazing photos.-It's light-It's cheapCons:-After two years the little door on the battery/SD card compartment gets stuck. I think the spring fell out.-After the first year the color started to fade around the edges of the camera. The little wheel thing is started to chip, the color on it I mean as well as the color on all the other buttons.-The photos aren't great. My sister's  Kodak EasyShare takes better photos. (Just an add on though, my sister's camera has a host of other problems that my camera does not.)-The zoom is kind of horrible.If you put in the time I've had the camera, how I've treated it, and the price the cons are hardly cons.Also:My baby cousin tossed it to the floor, and for a moment the LCD screen was screwed up, but it's recovered.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: ibessa
Reviews.Content: I bougth this camera to my aunt and uncle that never had a camera before. They learned quick how to use the camera and enjoyed a lot. Great purchase for a wonderful price.

Reviews.Title: Like it so far.
Reviews.Author: Miki W.
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived when it was supposed to and looks great. I think its more of a fuschia color then straight purple, but I like that too. I haven't take that many pictures with it yet, it doesn't have memory of its own so I'm buying a SD card. Also it didn't come with a case so I have to buy that too. It will be a good camera I think because it doesn't use disposable batteries and it is just the right size for me.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is good, although the flash is very bright, so if the object is close it appears too bright.  Camera's response is a little slow when turning on the camera, between snapshots, and when viewing pictures.  Other than that, the camera is good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Beyond Expectations- Super Camera and Price
Reviews.Author: Peter24g "peter24g"
Reviews.Content: This was one of the nicest, smallest cameras I've purchased, and I have to say it was more than what I expected. The quality is exceptiona, with the overall functionality being easy to use and learn. There are great feaures that will make anyone happy, with the really cool color to boot. This was actually a gift and the young lady was very extatic, she really loved it, and though I also added the extended warranty there really was no need, as the qualtiy is exceptional. I woul definetly recommend this little camera, with big charm.

Reviews.Title: My Exlim
Reviews.Author: Wesley Gardunia
Reviews.Content: I love my Exlim EX-235 12 mp digital camera! I use it all the time. The features are amazing and I love the color! It's also very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Crystal Atwood
Reviews.Content: This is my second Casio Exilim camera and I love it.  I have a Nikon DSLR that I use, but one needs a small camera as well.  And frankly - I get some awesome shots with this Casio I can't get with the Nikon due to some automatic settings for cool effects.  I love it, and I wouldn't be without it.  And my goodness - the price is right!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mtb
Reviews.Content: it's my first  digital camera and it is easy to use ,  and a clear pictures for the money.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: camera
Reviews.Content: Need an instruction book to read about the various features. You cann't carry a CD around with you for instructions

Reviews.Title: Worst Camera Ever- My cell phone takes better pictures
Reviews.Author: R. Erklin
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera at Costco for around $100 last year. We were so excited to have a new camera, and started playing with it immediately. We couldn't get the thing to focus from the get go, and figured we were doing something wrong and we'd figure it out eventually. We should have taken it back then. Flash forward a little over a year and we still have the thing. We've read the manual, we've looked online, we've messed around with it endlessly, but it's just super fickle. Sometimes the pictures come out great, and sometimes they're REALLY blurry. It has a feature where the little red marks on the screen turns green when it's focused if you hold the button 1/2 way down. Ours NEVER focuses. Sure, we get lucky occasionally, but really, who wants a camera that you can't rely on?! I actaully never even use it anymore since I got my Samsung Focus phone. Believe it or not, the phone is more reliable and takes better pictures.The zoom button has also been sticking when you try to zoom in or out.I consider myseld a fairly competent person, but I just can't figure out why this thing won't work, other than it's just a piece of junk.We're looking for a new camera for a trip because we can't rely on this one. A waste of $$ even if it isn't that much.

Reviews.Title: Husband likes it!
Reviews.Author: Froggymama
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and he seems to like it.  I have an older version of this camera which I love so I chose to buy him the same.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: A. Lattimer "Alainalazzz"
Reviews.Content: i had to buy a cam for school, and this one is perfect for what i needed. it's pretty simple. also, the color i got (purple) is amazing! so far, no problems.

Reviews.Title: MUY HERMOSA
Reviews.Author: MARTHA DE VENEZUELA
Reviews.Content: LA RECOMIENDO ES TAL CUAL COMO LO DESCRIBEN , LIVIANA HERMOSA Y SOBRE TODO TOMA UNA FOTOS NITIDAS Y POSEE UN POTENTE FLASH LOS VIDEOS SON DE BUENA CALIDAD, AL RECOMIENDO SI DESEAS PRESERVAR ESOS MOMENTOS UNICOS!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Does not focus
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I returned this camera within 20 days. The package is good, the contents cover everything you need. The problem I had was the camera would refuse to focus for 80% of the photographs. I tried all settings but to no avail. Though this camera seemed to be built sturdy the electronic and optics behind it were bad. More importantly, it was Made in China.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Mock
Reviews.Content: The description and product were exactly what I was looking for.  I had recently purchased a 10mp and it wasn't exactly what I wanted, but I love the 12mp and had a great time taking pictures of everything.  Uploading and taking pictures/videos is easy and I enjoy taking pictures again.  Great price and great seller!!

Reviews.Title: it's alright
Reviews.Author: Janica
Reviews.Content: If you're looking at a camera like this, you're probably not going out to try and make an HD feature film or anything so, you'll probably be alright using this camera for whatever you need to do. That being said, i will tell you about my experience with it. I really liked what I had seen from this camera on youtube videos and such, and the features all seemed like they would be helpful and easy to use, and they were, but the quality of what came out was kind of bad. Video-wise, this camera is awesome because it takes great videos that capture a lot of detail and sounds. Every picture i take on this though, is ridiculously ugly. I don't know if it's the flash or the settings on it, but i've messed with pretty much everything and I can't seem to get it to work. Everyone looks orange in my pictures, and the lighting is always really dark so it makes everything look mega dirty and weird. Maybe I just got a defective one though. I would recommend this camera anyway because it definitely does everything it says its gonna do. If anyone else has the same issue, help me!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th or 6th Exlim camera, I have owned one of them for nearly 10 years. I have upgraded and even sold/traded older versions to friends and family to purchase a newer model. I've only damaged one of them...water damage accident.  I carry it in my purse (protected in a little pouch) and everyone is amazed by it's size and versatility. It would take an awful lot for me to even consider purchasing a different camera.  I use it for personal use, family, vacations, reference, etc.  My son, brother and niece have followed my example and one one or more also.  I bought this camera for my 6 year old grandson for Christmas, his first 'real' camera but he liked my own 2 year old version better so we 'traded'...lucky me!  I absolutely love it!

Reviews.Title: Cute and does the job
Reviews.Author: Jenelle Randall
Reviews.Content: Cute little camera. Does the job and came in handy when my storage unit was flooded and I had to take quick pics of my mattress.Wasn't quite the one I wanted (my friend had a different version and I wanted her exact one- from the pictures onIone, I couldn't see the back tomake sure it was the right one) but it's cute and does the job.

Reviews.Title: rate
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: I just returned a casio because it was defective. I just received my new but do not want to rate the camera because i dont know if it will last 30 days.  If i would have rated the last camera it would have been premature as it did not last 30 days.  After 30 days i will rate the camera. I can only hope it will last longer... maybe i will get 60 days out of this one.  I would like to say that Amazon service hac been excellent. I returned the camera not thinking I would get another for at least 7 to 10 days. I was shocked when the camera after just making a claim was overnighted.  I do not recall a business that sent out a new product without getting the old one first. I will continue to do business with Amazon but only if the price is right.  Sometimes Amazon is more expensive and in this day the cheaper price wins.

Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim EX-Z35
Reviews.Author: Linda K. Wartow
Reviews.Content: It was defective and when I  called Casio to have it repaired, they said there would be a shipping and handling fee to send it to them.I called Electronics Expo LLC, where I bought it, and there were no other cameras to replace it with, so I am returning the camera for credit.  I don't know if I have to pay for shipping here, either.  If I do, I will be very upset.

Reviews.Title: buena calidad precio
Reviews.Author: Omar Luna
Reviews.Content: compre 4 camaras, 2 rosadas y 2 purpuras.. y todas salieron bien. buena calidad en la fotografia, compatibles incluso con memorias de 8gb y graba audio con video...

Reviews.Title: RECLAMO DEL PRODUCTO
Reviews.Author: rafael conde
Reviews.Content: BUENOS DIASEN DICIEMBRE HICE COMPRES EN SU RED DE AMAZON Y ADQUIRI UNA CAMARA CASIO PARA UN OBSEQUIO, AL LLEGAR AL PAIS DESTINO (VENEZUELA) PARA MI SORPRESA ES QUE LA CAMARA QUE ME HABIAN MANDADO ES USADA Y LA CUAL COMO LO DICE MI ORDEN DE COMPRA YO ADQUIRI UNA CAMARA NUEVA FAVOR LE PIDO CON TODA RESPONSABILIDAD SOLVENTAR ESTE PROBLEMA LO CUAL COMO HAGO REFERENCIA ANTERIORMENTE LA CAMARA QUE YO SOLICITE ES NUEVA IGUALMENTE LES INFORMO QUE LA CAMARA QUE ME ENVIARON APARTE QUE ES USADA SE ENCUENTRA EN MAL ESTADO TANTO FISICO COMO EN FUNCIONAMIENTO YA QUE LA MISMA SE APAGA SOLA AL CABO DE LOS 10 MIN DE HABERLA ENCENDIDO.SE QUE UD COMO RED SON ENTES RESPONSABLES POR LO CUAL SOLICITO FORMALMENTE ME SEA SOLVENTADO ESTA PROBLEMATICA FAVOR ESPERO SU RESOPUESTA VIA E-MAILATENTAMENTERAFAEL CONDE.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1-megapixel resolution
3x optical zoom; 2.5-inch LCD screen
Face Detection
Record widescreen movies; YouTube Movie Mode for easy video sharing
Capture photos and video to SD/SDHC memory (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-Z35 12 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.5-Inch LCD (Pink)
